name: Bewitching Wendy
description:
Wendy tries to perform a ritual to destroy an entire village! Grab loot from the townsfolk to become stronger and better at protecting that pedestal in the middle.

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move
Z - Attack with current weapon
X - Use first potion
C - Use second potion

Potions list:
Red Power - Increased your attack damage temporarly.
Blue Cooldown - Decreases your weapon cooldown rate
Yellow Speed - Makes you faster for a few moments
Green Nature - Restore your dahlia's petals
